text: Honest people can have philosophical and political differences and, in a democracy, we debate those differences.  That's a good thing. Today, however, we do not have a president who discusses ideas or debates issues. He simply lies all the time. And that's a very bad thing.
Kirstjen Nielsen should resign immediately. She is leading an agency that has separated children from their parents and attempted to use them as leverage. It’s immoral and she should go.

Yesterday I got a tour of an immigration detention facility and visited with the mothers separated from their children. And my heart is broken. These mothers personal stories demonstrate a human rights abuse committed by the United States government. We have to keep fighting. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgZns80X0AAje5r.jpg

RT @senorrinhatch “Tender age shelters” is a chilling phrase we will not soon forget. 

The child separation policy should be halted now. 

https://www.hatch.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/releases?ID=5DDF86E0-48F5-4184-AF36-5C7600CA5F7A #utpol  https://apnews.com/dc0c9a5134d14862ba7c7ad9a811160e
RT @mattyglesias I know I sleep better at night knowing the President is working hard to protect my family from the twin menaces of Central American toddlers and inexpensive Canadian aluminum.

RT @CoryBooker Love over hate

Love over indifference

Love over ignorance 

Love over ego

Love over fear 

Love over barriers 

Love over borders 

Love over 

And over

And over 

Again

RT @JeffFlake "Tender Age" shelters for toddlers? This gets even worse as the layers are peeled back. End the policy, Mr. President. http://nymag.com/daily/intelligencer/2018/06/trump-administration-keeps-babies-and-toddlers-in-shelters.html
Too many lives have been ruined because of the War on Drugs. Federal marijuana legalization and restorative justice are about stopping our country from repeating the same mistakes of the past.

You never would have guessed this was in her future if you met her in elementary school. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgS62oOVQAUfa5E.jpg
Trump's pathological dishonesty is undermining American democracy, is setting a terrible example for our children and is isolating us from our democratic allies around the world.

https://apnews.com/amp/dc0c9a5134d14862ba7c7ad9a811160e?__twitter_impression=true
Huge corporations should not be profiting from the detention of human beings. Period. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DgZ_u-aXUAAm4-3.jpg

Powerful corporations and their Republican allies are working overtime to roll back basic rules that protect working Americans. Why? The answer’s pretty simple. It's the culture of corruption in Washington. https://theintercept.com/2018/06/08/elizabeth-warren-v-the-district-of-corruption/

Our government's continued failure in Puerto Rico is unacceptable. With another hurricane season coming, we need to investigate why it happened and prevent another disaster from happening again. https://www.cbsnews.com/news/this-isnt-a-suitable-place-to-live-many-in-puerto-rico-under-tarps-as-storm-threat-looms/

Now is not a time for despair or resignation. It is a time for the American people to fight back on every front.

https://www.washingtonpost.com/opinions/trump-is-a-bald-faced-liar/2018/06/22/75d70334-7576-11e8-805c-4b67019fcfe4_story.html

Let’s be clear: a society is judged based on how it treats its children. A society is judged based on how it treats the least among us. And we will be judged harshly. History will judge us harshly because of what this Administration has done. https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2018-06-22/harris-says-trump-guilty-of-crimes-against-humanity-on-border
